title: The Grayson Duet
description: I don’t dance with the Devil. I dance with his shadow instead.Joseph Grayson is a cartel enforcer.A killer.A man who holds his secrets in his chilly gray-blue eyes, as if they’ve been frozen into place and nothing can defrost them.I was just another job to him, but when he rescued me from a cage in Amsterdam something jolted between us. There was a touch. Words...A promise I can't recall, because I make it my business not to remember much of anything anymore. I tried to run from his obsession, following a trail of the dead, from Miami all the way to Colombia. Now I've fallen into darkness again, and he's the only one I see.Caught up in a cartel war. Trapped between love and hate.One night will change everything…*The Grayson Duet is a heart-stopping, enemies to lovers mafia romance with NO cliff-hanger and a guaranteed HEA. For mature readers only.*This collection features the complete duet PLUS bonus material.
author: Catherine Wiltcher
